document_data.name: Black Alaric's
document_data.mainbody: '''Black Alaric's''' was a tavern in the [[Amn]]ian city of [[Esmeltaran]] during the 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: The tavern was built on the western side of Esmeltaran, near the western city gate.
document_data.Services: Black Alaric's provided fair service at surprisingly cheap prices.
